title: EXPLOITATION - ALL APPLICATIONS DUMP - AFTER EOM (But Atlas)

task_list.instruction_title:
Dear SPOC_EXPLOITATION team,

Please proceed with the following backup phase:

**
_Phase ID:_ 250
****_Phase name: _ALL_APP_PROD_AFTER_EOM (EXCEPT ATLAS)**

**_Description:
_**

For all applications included in the migration process (**EXCEPT ATLAS**), **AFTER EOW/EOM CONTROLS **please proceed with the following **BACKUP **activities.

On **PROD LIKE**: **BACKUP **all applications related to migration (**EXCEPT ATLAS**)
